trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>發生事件，只有當您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the unknown XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示未知 XML 屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> that represents the unknown XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 表示未知 XML 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML attribute names expected to be in an XML document instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得應該在 XML 文件執行個體中之 XML 屬性名稱的逗號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited list of XML attribute names.
trans-unit.target: XML 屬性名稱的逗號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: Each name is in the following format: <paramref name="namespace" />:<paramref name="name" />.
trans-unit.target: 每個名稱都使用下列格式：<paramref name="namespace" />:<paramref name="name" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number of the unknown XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得未知 XML 屬性的行號。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the unknown XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 未知 XML 屬性的行號。

trans-unit.source: The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the line of the unknown XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得未知 XML 屬性的行中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position number of the unknown XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 未知 XML 屬性的位置編號。

trans-unit.source: The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object being deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得要還原序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object being deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 正在還原序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the value returned by the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method encounters an unknown attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列印所傳回的值<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法時<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法遇到未知的屬性。
